      • substituteHostIndexes

        public static Map<String,Set<String>> substituteHostIndexes(Map<String,Set<String>> clusterHostInfo)
                                                     throws org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException
        Given a clusterHostInfo map, replaces host indexes with the mapped host names.

        If all_hosts was ["host1", "host2", "host3", "host4", "host5"], then a value of ["1-3", "5"] for a given component would be converted to ["host1", "host2", "host3", "host5"].

        Operations are performed inplace, meaning a new clusterHostInfo map is not created and updated.

        Parameters:
        clusterHostInfo - the cluster host info map to perform the substitutions within
        Returns:
        the updated cluster host info map.
        Throws:
        org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException - if an index fails to map to a host name

      • replaceRanges

        public static Set<String> replaceRanges(SortedSet<Integer> set)
        Finds ranges in sorted set and replaces ranges by compact notation

        For example, suppose set comprises [1, 2, 3, 4, 7]. After invoking rangedSet = StageUtils.replaceRanges(set) rangedSet will comprise ["1-4", "7"]..

        Parameters:
        set - the source set to be ranged

      • replaceMappedRanges

        public static <T> Set<String> replaceMappedRanges(List<T> values)
        Finds ranges in list and replaces ranges by compact notation

        For example, suppose list comprises [1, 1, 2, 2, 1, 3]. After invoking rangedMappedSet = StageUtils.replaceMappedRanges(list) rangedMappedSet will comprise ["1:0-1,4", "2:2-3", "3:5"]..

        Parameters:
        values - the source list to be ranged

                                       Configuration configuration)
        Fill hots level parameters with Jdk details, override them with the stack JDK data, in case of stack JAVA_HOME exists

      • createComponentHostMap

        public static Map<String,String> createComponentHostMap(Collection<String> services,
                                                        Function<String,Collection<String>> componentsLookup,
                                                        BiFunction<String,String,Collection<String>> hostAssignmentLookup)
        Create a component -> hosts mapping that can be used for clusterHostInfo. Component names are transformed to clusterHostInfo keys ("_hosts" is appended). List of hosts is comma-separated.
        Parameters:
        services - collection of services to create the mapping for
        componentsLookup - function to find components of a given service
        hostAssignmentLookup - function to find hosts of a given (service, component) pair
        Returns:
        component names
